attributes.review: i would definitely give this app lower then one star if i could. because of the recent news on taking down the app tiktok the genz’s are coming together and taking down this app. please and thank you
attributes.title: this app is HORRIBLE

attributes.review: Every time I opened this app I threw up and I’m pretty sure it has a literal virus because I tried to show my mom why I was so sick and she threw up too. Quite obviously this is absolutely disgusting and the app is trying to make people sick.
attributes.title: It hurt me to download this

attributes.review: This app made me start smelling bad. One day i was getting compliments bc of how good i smelled then i downloaded this app bc Why not, and then the next day no one could be around me since i smelled so bad. Don’t download this app unless you want to smell like refried beans and old cheese for days.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I was excited to use this app but when I first opened it I was absolutely horrified 🤬🤬🤬. I saw Donald trump in a bikini riding Sebastian Bails like a pony while singing! I didn’t get this app to see a bunch of orange people singing feel good inc by the Gorillaz🤦‍♂️. I also saw his son Barron dunking a basketball while crying. Terrible app
attributes.title: Not cool

attributes.review: Easily the worst app I have ever downloaded. Took 3 days to download. It took up all of my storage, even worse, I was greeted by this strange orange guy when it downloaded. This man legit made me wanna barf. Idk why the game chose the ugliest character to host. Honestly a poopy app and is really bootleg.
attributes.title: Worst app for worst President

attributes.review: This app took hours to install, and my device is quite new. Then, when I got in, I was surprised to see a video of Donald Trump, our AMAZING president ❤️, doing the devils tango with ME! 😯. I am absolutely disgusted about this, and you will be hearing from my lawyers 😠😡!!!!
attributes.title: never again 💕

attributes.review: while downloading this app it kept making my phone crash 😠 and all of his plans are bs and should not be supported. the app was hard to follow and wasn’t doing any good for my mental health. DONT DOWNLOAD IT I REPEAT DONT DOWNLOAD IT. also since he wants to delete our tiktok we can delete his dumb app 🤪
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.review: this app took too long to download, it had a very scary picture as it’s main screen. it was what is wrong with america now and i do not and will not agree with this. trust me. DO. NOT. GET. THIS. APP. it’s the worst thing apple has let come into contact with them💀💀
attributes.title: SHOULDN’T EVEN BE ALLOWED TO BE AN APP

attributes.review: So here I was using this app and then a rebublican bust open my door and shouted “GIVE ME YOUR MONEY” at first I was scared but then realized this ugly Karen is weak so I jump kicked her sending her to Jupiter, but she’s still alive, thriving in Jupiter. Anyways yeah this app sends crazy people to your house so DONT GET IT!
attributes.title: Wouldnt download even if it pays me 1M to..

attributes.review: This app is horrible it’s a nightmare I was scrolling through the app and it froze and I had to get my phone fixed and I had to pay $900 to get it fixed and this app made me have nightmares of a orange guy that is racist I don’t like that app it’s horrible
attributes.title: This is the WORST APP EVER
